remark.ch: 資訊電機學院大學部四年級可選修。

goal.en: The objective of this course is to build the concepts in sufficient depth so that students acquire the knowledge and skills needed to design practical power electronic systems. In addition, this course enables the students to effectively use those concepts in the design process of the renewable energy system. Finally, the journal paper reading is necessary to increase students’ knowledge of power conversions.
goal.ch: 建立學生對切換式電源的概念，瞭解如何分析電路特性與參數設計，並應用於再生能源轉換器，進而培養學生對期刊閱讀的能力。

content.en: The solid-state energy conversion is introduced including the ac/dc and dc/ac power conversion, which can be used in renewable and power system.
content.ch: 主要介紹固態能量的轉換，包括電能轉換之基本原理及交直流及直交流電能轉換的技術及其應用。

textbook.en: References :Control in Power Electronics, MARIAN P. KAZMIERKOWSKI, ACADEMIC PRESS
textbook.ch: “參考書：電力電子控制( Control in Power Electronics, MARIAN P. KAZMIERKOWSKI, ACADEMIC PRESS)“

grading.ch: 作業成績 30％ 期中報告 35％ 期末報告 35％

en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Assignments ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Attendance/Performance
